name: Proceedings upon claim
text: If a claim for compensation is made, the director shall make such further investigation as deemed necessary and render a decision within sixty days after the conclusion of the hearing awarding or denying compensation, stating the findings of fact and conclusions of law.  The director may extend the due date for decisions for good cause provided all parties agree.  The decision shall be filed with the record of the proceedings and a copy of the decision shall be sent immediately to each party. [L 1963, c 116, pt of §1; Supp, §97-95; HRS ; am L 1985, c 296, §8]
